New from acclaimed filmmaker T.C. Christensen (The Cokeville Miracle, 17 Miracles) comes the inspiring true story of Kennedy Hansen… a funny, loving child who inexplicably begins to fall. It takes years for the diagnosis…Juvenile Batten Disease, an extremely rare, terrible and terminal prognosis. There is no cure for Batten Disease and after living only sixteen years, Kennedy leaves behind a great legacy of love and friendship. But her story doesn’t end at her death, that’s when the miracles really begin.
